boardgame.name: Álmodj Velem!
Když sním
Kraina snów
Lumea Viselor
When I Dream
นักท่องฝัน
私が夢みるとき 日本語版
說夢人
boardgame.description: The night has fallen and your mind is floating in the magical world of dreams. But the Dream Spirits want to have some fun tonight! They are giving their best and the dreams become strange and surreal. Become the dreamer, put on your sleeping mask and try to figure out your dream and which spirits are the Naughty ones. Become a good spirit and help the Dreamer by giving him clues about the dream before the naughty spirits mess it up. Close your eyes and dive in!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;At the beginning of each round of When I Dream one player takes the role of the Dreamer and _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;falls asleep_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;, wearing a cloth mask. The other players are secretly dealt their role cards determining what kind of spirits they are _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;good_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; or _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;naughty_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; or if they are just _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;tricksters_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; changing sides as the game goes by._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The whole round lasts 120 seconds in which the spirits are drawing _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Dream_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; cards depicting a specific element of the dream, trying to describe them to the dreamer using one word each. The dreamer can guess what the element of the Dream is at any time, placing the card to the good spirits team side if the guess was correct and in the naughty spirits pile if it was not. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;At the end of the round the Dreamer and the good spirits get a point for every card in the good spirits pile, when the naughty spirits get one point for every card in the naughty spirits pile. The tricksters get points according to how well balanced the two teams were at the end of the round, gaining extra points if they managed to equally balance the two piles._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;At the end of the round, the dreamer must use the words he guessed and story-tell his dream for extra points before he opens his eyes._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;You can learn how to play in a few minutes and have a great laugh right from the start. Each role is challenging and entertaining giving the game more depth according to the player_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s imagination, providing a wonderful experience with a unique dream every round._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: Game: When I Dream (Drawlab) Condition: new in shrinkwrap Language: English in stock (just arrived from Essen fair!) Thanks in advance for ordering! See below for information on shipping, payment _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; cancellation. Payment: Bank transfer to an EU bank account using IBAN/BIC in advance (normally free of charge if your bank account is nominated in EURO) Paypal (add 3,- Euro to cover the fees. That should be the first choice for non-EU customers.) Pick up the game at my game store (no shipping cost) Shipping: always insured and with tracking Germany: 5,99€ for the first item card games or smaller boxes might be cheaper (please contact me beforehand) EU: 13,99€ up to 2kg 15,99€ up to 5kg 20,99€ up to 10kg Rest of the world: Please contact me before purchasing an item to clarify the shipping costs. I can offer discounts on shipping if multiple marketplace purchases are made. Returns and Cancellation: You may cancel your order without giving any reasons within 14 days after placing your order. Please contact spieleberatung@t-online.de and I will attempt to resolve the matter. Unopened copies of the game that are no longer wanted can be returned, but there is a 10% restocking fee payable of the item price and the buyer is responsible for the return shipping costs. Spieleberatung Frank Solnitzky Hainbuchenweg 1 36381 Schlüchtern Germany +49-06661-9115039 frank@spieleberatung.com
just played once

Bought it, but never got to play the game. The game is new, except for the missing shrink around the box. The mask and cards are still in shrink. English version! If you are interested and want to see more pictures, just let me know!
